title.rendered: Bhoot: Part One – The Haunted Ship

content.rendered:
Directed by Bhanu Pratap Singh

Written by Bhanu Pratap Singh

Cast Vicky Kaushal (Prithvi Prakashan). Ashutosh Rana (Professor Raghuveer Joshi). Meher Vij (Vandana). Akash Dhar (Riaz). Sara Gesawat (Meera). Priya Chauhan (Nilofer). Sanjay Gurbaxani (Agnihotri). Bhumi Pednekar (Sapna). Siddhant Kapoor (Captain Siddharth Roy (as Siddhanth Kapoor)). Inayah Chowdhry (Young Meera (as Inayah Chowdhary)). Khushi Hajare (Megha). Suraj Vyas (Jolly Patel). Chitra Sharma (Jyoti). Suraj Sonik (Vikas). Parthaa Akerkar (Victor). Ankit Devanshi (Ibrahim). Aashna Arora (Anchor 3). Akshay Baghel (Beach Boy 1). Akash Beri (Anchor 2). Veera Bhanushali (Newborn Megha). Neha Bhatia (Church Girl 1). Shubham Permji Chawda (Faceless). Vicky Chawla (Ship Crew Member 5). Raja Gujral (Ship Crew Member 2). Bhiku Jhetva (Ship Crew Member 1). Sajida Khan (Meera Sleeping). Somendra Kumar (Peon Dg Office).Sameer Malhotra. Mona Mathews (Anchor 1). Santosh Mishra (Ship Crew Member 6). Vipin Kumar Mittal (Raju – Lifeguard). Pooja Pandit (Church Girl 2). Bharati Perwani (Nun 2 (as Bharti Perwani)). Ravi Raja (Ship Crew Member 8). Abhishek Rawat (Sunder). Shreya Sahani (Meera 14 Underwater Body Double). Sahil Setia (Register Office Guy). Jannat Shaikh (Meera Crawling). Kabir Shaikh (Ship Crew Member 9). Anit Sharma (Lifeguard). Nirbhay Shukla (Anchor 5). Ibrahim Shyad (Ship Crew Member 4). Harry Singh (Ship Crew Member 3). Lavishka Singh (Meera 3 Underwater Body Double). Pankaj Singh (Ship Crew Member 7). Aditya Tarnach (Amar). Suresh Thakur (Bone Breaker). Shashank Shekhar Upadhyay (Beach Boy 2). Kavita Waadhawan (Nun 1). Suresh Yadav (Anchor 4)

Languages Hindi

Producers Parth Dholakia. Krishnan Jay. Hiroo Johar. Karan Johar. Shashank Khaitan. Apoorva Mehta. Somen Mishra. Anand Raichura

Production Dharma Production. Sony Music India
